en: Give ear to my prayer, O God; And hide not thyself from my supplication.
hmr: Aw Pathien, ka ṭawngṭainaa hin nâ lo sit la, Lunginsiet ka hninaa hin inthup naw rawh.

en: Attend unto me, and answer me: I am restless in my complaint, and moan,
hmr: Mi lo ngai la, mi hung dawn rawh. Ka lunginzîng leiin kân vêl ruoi a, kân rûm hlak;

en: Because of the voice of the enemy, Because of the oppression of the wicked; For they cast iniquity upon me, And in anger they persecute me.
hmr: A mi dotuhai ri lei le, Mi rilo hnesiena leihaiin. Anni chun suolnain an mîn hlumkhumin, Lunginsenin an mi suknawmna sih a.

en: My heart is sore pained within me: And the terrors of death are fallen upon me.
hmr: Ka sûnga hin ka lungril a na êm êm a, Thina ṭiumhai chun an mi del a.

en: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me, And horror hath overwhelmed me.
hmr: Ṭitna le inthinnain an mi bawh a, Thlabârnain a mîn khum zo tah.

en: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! Then would I fly away, and be at rest.
hmr: Chuongchun, “Aw, vaṭhu anga thla nei ka va nuom de! Chuongchun, vuong dai ka ta, lungmuongtakin um ka tih.

en: Lo, then would I wander far off, I would lodge in the wilderness. [Selah
hmr: Ngai ta, hlatakah inlêng ka ta, Thlalêrah um ka ta,

en: I would haste me to a shelter From the stormy wind and tempest.
hmr: Thli hrâttak le, thlipui hi, Inbîkna hmunah ka mâksan vak ding bah,” ka tih a.

en: Destroy, O Lord, and divide their tongue; For I have seen violence and strife in the city.
hmr: Aw LALPA, an lei chu suksiein sukthlêr la, Khawpuia chun inpâwngnêkna le inkhîkinkhalna ka hmu sih a.

en: Day and night they go about it upon the walls thereof: Iniquity also and mischief are in the midst of it.
hmr: A sûn a zânin khawpui chu kul tlângah an vêl an vêl a, A sûnga chun suolna le rinumna a um bawk a.

en: Wickedness is in the midst thereof: Oppression and guile depart not from its streets.
hmr: Rîtlona a sûngah a um a, Hlêmna le zâwrna chun a kawtthlêr chu a suoksan ngai nawh.

en: For it was not an enemy that reproached me; Then I could have borne it: Neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me; Then I would have hid myself from him:
hmr: A mi hrilsetu chu hmêlma a ni si nawh a, Ni sienla chu ka tuor thei lem ding bah; Ka chunga insuklien chu a mi theidatu a ni bawk nawh a: Ni sienla chu kân bîkhmangsan ding bah.

en: But it was thou, a man mine equal, My companion, and my familiar friend.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nang, ka mi inangpui, Ka ruol, ka ruol pâwlngei i ni mieu sih a.

en: We took sweet counsel together; We walked in the house of God with the throng.
hmr: Bau thlumtakin ei inbiek hlak a, Mipui laia chun Pathien biek inah ei lêng hlak kha.

en: Let death come suddenly upon them, Let them go down alive into Sheol; For wickedness is in their dwelling, in the midst of them.
hmr: Thina an chungah hung tlung thut sienla, Khur sûnga chun a hringin fe thla raw hai se; Rîtlonahai chu an umnaa le an sûngahai an um sih a.

en: As for me, I will call upon God; And Jehovah will save me.
hmr: Kei chun chu Pathien chu ko ka ta, Chuongchun, LALPAIN mi sandam a tih.

en: Evening, and morning, and at noonday, will I complain, and moan; And he will hear my voice.
hmr: Zântieng dâm, zîngkâr dâm, sûna dâm ka lunginzîngna thu hrilin inrûm ka ta: Chuongchun, ama chun ka râwl lo ngai a tih.

en: He hath redeemed my soul in peace from the battle that was against me; For they were many that strove with me.
hmr: Ka chunga an mi thawnaa inthawk chun ka hringna hi lungmuongtakin a sanhim tah a; A mi thawtuhai chu an tam sih a.

en: God will hear, and answer them, Even he that abideth of old, [Selah The men who have no changes, And who fear not God.
hmr: Pathien, tiena chena um zing ta chun, Ngai a ta, anni chu suktlâwm a tih. Danglamna nei ngailo, Pathien ṭî ngai si lohai chu.

en: He hath put forth his hands against such as were at peace with him: He hath profaned his covenant.
hmr: Ama le inremhai chunga chun a kut ân lêt a, A thuthlung chu a sukkhawhlo tah a.

en: His mouth was smooth as butter, But his heart was war: His words were softer than oil, Yet were they drawn swords.
hmr: A bau chu nênetui kîng angin a tlawr a, A lungril ruok chu indona a ni sih a; A thuhai chu hriek nêkin ân nâl a, Nisienlakhawm, kawlhnâm phawisahai a ni sih a.

en: Cast thy burden upon Jehovah, and he will sustain thee: He will never suffer the righteous to be moved.
hmr: I rikphur chu LALPA chunga innghat la; chuongchun, amain sukhrât a che, Mi fel chu iengtika khawm sukhnîng phal naw nih.

en: But thou, O God, wilt bring them down into the pit of destruction: Bloodthirsty and deceitful men shall not live out half their days; But I will trust in thee.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw Pathien, nangin anni chu bohmang- na khura chun infe thlâktir i ta, Thisen insuo hmang ke le hlêm hmang mihai chu an dam sûng chenve khawm dam naw ni hai: Kei ruok chun nang chu ring ka ti che.
